description: strap has red, blue, green, white, and brown pattern woven on top, with tan along edge and tweed fabric underside; strap tied to horn with leather; horn plug connected with chain; gold colored horn with map in red and black ink; doe with fawn also drawn on horn; "Master Gordon Barlow fecit Ron Ehlert in Duck River, TN. ANO MCMXCVII" engraved in box on horn; end cap silver with lion and unicorn crest
medium: Cow horn, wood, silver, steel, leather, porcupine quill, fabric, metal, hair
title: Colonial-style (c. 1755 - 1760) Powder Horn
